item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 21, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning (62 points | 8 comments)
2. IronRDP: a Rust implementation of Microsoft's RDP protocol (272 points | 135 comments)
3. Show HN: A terminal emulator in pure PHP (74 points | 47 comments)
4. Chunking Attacks on File Backup Services Using Content-Deﬁned Chunking [pdf] (57 points | 14 comments)
5. Global population datasets systematically underrepresent rural population (96 points | 39 comments)
6. A Win for Encryption: France Rejects Backdoor Mandate (40 points | 1 comment)
7. Lock Contention (14 points | discuss)
8. Ancient DNA Shows Stone Age Europeans Voyaged by Sea to Africa (32 points | 3 comments)
9. New USPTO Memo Makes Fighting Patent Trolls Even Harder (106 points | 34 comments)
10. Mathup: Easy MathML authoring tool with a quick to write syntax (61 points | 17 comments)
11. Piccolo: Large-Scale Graph Processing with Fine-Grained In-Memory Scatter-Gather (15 points | discuss)
12. Show HN: Hyperbrowser MCP Server – Connect AI agents to the web through browsers (13 points | discuss)
13. Career Development: What It Means to Be a Manager, Director, or VP (2015) (352 points | 175 comments)
14. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) is hiring Back end Engineers ( | hide)
15. Liberapay (161 points | 44 comments)

18. Legged Locomotion Meets Skateboarding (73 points | 17 comments)
19. 'The Celts: A Modern History' by Ian Stewart Review (78 points | 22 comments)
20. Researcher uses AI to make texts that are thousands of years old readable (2023) (12 points | 2 comments)
21. Even the worst mass extinction had its oases (69 points | 35 comments)
22. Wheel Reinventor’s Principles (2024) (175 points | 89 comments)
23. German company set for first commercial rocket launch from Europe (47 points | 14 comments)
24. Population much more than 8.2B, rural areas underestimated (35 points | 9 comments)
25. Oxidizing Ubuntu: adopting Rust utilities by default (7 points | 1 comment)
26. Specializing Python with E-Graphs (46 points | 4 comments)
27. Apple shuffles AI executive ranks in bid to turn around Siri (285 points | 475 comments)
28. Napkin Math Tool (91 points | 27 comments)
29. How 'Careless People' is becoming a bigger problem for Meta (19 points | 6 comments)
30. Sync Engines Are the Future (280 points | 178 comments)
